tool_description: Ordering Stack Venue API. Manages all aspects of venue (restaurant or store). Create and edit venues, set attributes, etc...
name: Venue
title: Venue

api_list.name: validateCluster
api_list.description: Validate venue cluster (batch of venues). Returns information if order can be made to those venues simultaneously. Currently only single venue is allowed.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://venue1.p.rapidapi.com/venue-api/api/venue/validateCluster"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "venue1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: postVenue
api_list.description: Update venue by ID. Works as upsert

api_list.name: activateVenue
api_list.description: Activate venue by ID. Active venues can receive orders.

api_list.name: deactivateVenue
api_list.description: Deactivate venue by ID. Inactive venues cannot receive orders.
